item.title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows Drops to Just £48 Using This Promo Code in the UK
item.content:encoded:
https://www.ign.com/articles/assassins-creed-shadows-best-deal-uk

The lowest price since launch.

While still usually priced at around £55 minimum if you want to get a physical copy, you can grab Assassin's Creed Shadows on PS5 for just £48.02 with Monster Shop on eBay.

Originally £56.49, already down from its base price of £69.99, you can get 15% taken off thanks to the "RALLY15" coupon code usable on any of the outlet's items available in the store right now. Apply the code at checkout, and you'll have £8.07 taken off with no delivery charge either.

Assassin's Creed Shadows (PS5)

Assassin's Creed Shadows is still priced at £69.99 for a digital copy on the PSN Store. So, if you want to own the game without paying £14.99 a month via the Premium tier of the Ubisoft+ subscription service, this is the best way to play on PS5.

If you end up playing through it quickly enough, you'll then be able to exchange or sell the physical copy to make some money back and get the best level of bang for your buck.

The bargains don't end there, however. Because the discount applies to every game on Monster Shop's eBay store, you can net yourself some other great deals at 15% off — like getting a pre-order of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 for only £39.52 on PS5 or £37.40 on Xbox Series X|S.

An upcoming story-driven single-player RPG by new studio Sandfall Interactive, out on April 24, Expedition 33 has been quite the eye-catching game to look out for—catching our "undivided attention" during our preview.

As far as gripping narrative-based games go, based on first impressions, paying just under £40 on a pre-order is quite the steal in itself.

At Monster Shop's full list of items on sale, there are some other decent PS5 deals you can get as well, like SpongeBob SquarePants: The Patrick Star Game for £25.49, Two Point Museum - Explorer Edition for £27.62, or Bleach: Rebirth of Souls for £40.37.

We currently don't know how long Monster Shop is keeping the RALLY15 code active for, but it looks like the stock of the biggest games is selling out fast. If you're keen for any of these new titles to add to your backlog, get on them while you can.

Ben Williams – IGN freelance contributor with over 10 years of experience covering gaming, tech, film, TV, and anime. Follow him on Twitter/X @BenLevelTen.

Originally posted:

Apr 9, 2025 2:24 pm

item.title: Go Fishing Codes (April 2025)
item.content:encoded:
https://www.ign.com/articles/go-fishing-codes

Need extra supplies in Go Fishing? These codes are for you!

If you're in need of extra supplies and resources in Go Fishing, you're in the right place. Below, we've put together a list of all the active redeemable codes currently available in Roblox's popular fishing simulator, so you can get back to tracking down big catches with some useful new goodies attached to your belt.

Active Go Fishing Codes (April 2025)

Below, you'll find all of the currently active and working Go Fishing codes in April 2025 that you can redeem for free rewards:

  • SPRINGTIME - 10 Luck Potion IV (NEW!)
  • 150KLIKES - 3 Giant Gifts
  • GOFISHING - Cash
  • ONEBAITONEFISH - Rocket Bait
  • FREEBAITS - 10 Grape Baits
  • 50KLIKES - 5 Gold Baits

Expired Go Fishing Codes

The following Go Fishing codes have expired and can no longer be redeemed as of April 2025:

  • TODAYSPICKS
  • MERRYXMAS2024
  • CHRISTMAS2024

How to Redeem Codes in Go Fishing

To redeem Go Fishing codes, boot up the game and, once you’re in, follow the steps below:

  1. Look at the icons on the left-hand side of the screen. In the row, you'll see one labelled "Shop" with a present icon.
  2. Select the Shop icon to open up the storefront.
  3. In the bottom left-hand corner of the storefront page, you'll see a code bar. Input your code here and then press claim to redeem it.

Why Isn't My Go Fishing Code Working?

If your Go Fishing code isn’t working, it’s likely due to one of two scenarios. The first is that the code was inputted incorrectly. Check the spelling and that the case is correct, then redeem again. You can even copy and paste the codes directly from this article over to Roblox if you want to make sure you’re inputting them correctly.

The other possibility is the code has expired or you’ve already used it. In this scenario, you should see an error message pop up below the storefront menu informing you that the code has already been redeemed or is invalid.

How to Get More Go Fishing Codes

To check whether any new Go Fishing codes have been added, you'll want to become a member of the game's official Discord server. Once you're in, you can check the codes channel to see whether the devs have added any new codes to the game.

What is Go Fishing in Roblox?

Similar to other major Roblox hits like Fisch, Go Fishing drops you into a large open world ocean with a fishing rod and a simple goal. Catch fish, sell them for money, use that money to upgrade your gear and then catch rarer fish. Along the way, you'll visit a variety of unique islands, buy boats, and scrounge the depths of the ocean for the most elusive catches possible, attempting to cement yourself as the greatest fisher roaming the high seas.

Callum Williams is an IGN freelancer covering features and guides. When he's away from his desk, you can usually find him obsessing over the lore of the latest obscure indie horror game or bashing his head against a boss in the newest soulslike. You can catch him over on Twitter at @CaIIumWilliams.
